contexts.context: ...paradoxically beautiful and bloody. Vivec is an artistic <mark>violence</mark>. Vivec is represented in Temple literature and liturgy...
...hidden aspects of Vivec, the darker components of <mark>violence</mark>, lust, and conspiracy associated the more primitive...
...the Willpower to resist the world's temptations. When <mark>violence</mark> is needful, we fight with staves and hammers...
